mapper.select: select b.no, b.category, b.title, b.contents, b.member_no as memberNo, b.reg_date as regDate, b.reply_state as replyState, m.id, m.name from ${db}.board b, ${db}.member m where b.member_no = m.no and m.state='회원' limit ${size} offset ${offset}

choose.when: select b.no, b.category, b.title, b.contents, b.member_no as memberNo, b.reg_date as regDate, b.reply_state as replyState, m.id, m.name, m.state from ${db}.board b, ${db}.member m where b.member_no = m.no and m.state = '회원' and b.category = #{keyword} limit ${size} offset #{offset}
choose.otherwise: select b.no, b.category, b.title, b.contents, b.member_no as memberNo, b.reg_date as regDate, b.reply_state as replyState, m.id, m.name, m.state from ${db}.board b, ${db}.member m where b.member_no = m.no and m.state = '회원' and m.${option} like '%${keyword}%' limit ${size} offset #{offset}

choose.when: select count(*) from ${db}.board b, ${db}.member m where b.member_no = m.no and m.state='회원'
select count(*) from ${db}.board b, ${db}.member m where b.member_no = m.no and m.state='회원' and b.category = #{keyword}
choose.otherwise: select count(*) from ${db}.board b, ${db}.member m where b.member_no = m.no and m.state='회원' and ${option} like '%${keyword}%'

mapper.select: select no, category, title, contents, member_no as memberNo, reg_date as regDate, reply_state as replyState from ${db}.board where no=#{no}
select no, parents_no as parentsNo, contents, reg_date as regDate from ${db}.reply where parents_no=#{no}
mapper.delete: delete from ${db}.board where no=#{no} and reply_state=false

choose.when: select count(*) from ${db}.item_board i, ${db}.member m where i.member_no = m.no and m.state='회원'
choose.otherwise: select count(*) from (select b.no, b.title, b.contents, b.reg_date as regDate, b.member_no as memberNo, b.item_no as itemNo, b.reply_state as replyState, i.code, m.id, i.name as itemName from ${db}.item_board b, ${db}.member m, ${db}.item i where b.member_no = m.no and b.item_no = i.no and m.state='회원') a where a.${option} like '%${keyword}%'

mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, b.contents, b.reg_date as regDate, b.member_no as memberNo, b.item_no as itemNo, b.reply_state as replyState, i.code, m.id, i.main_image as mainImage, i.name as itemName from ${db}.item_board b, ${db}.member m, ${db}.item i where b.member_no = m.no and b.item_no = i.no and m.state='회원' limit ${size} offset #{offset}

select * from (select b.no, b.title, b.contents, b.reg_date as regDate, b.member_no as memberNo, b.item_no as itemNo, b.reply_state as replyState, i.code, m.id, i.main_image as mainImage, i.name as itemName from ${db}.item_board b, ${db}.member m, ${db}.item i where b.member_no = m.no and b.item_no = i.no and m.state='회원') a where a.${option} like '%${keyword}%' limit ${size} offset #{offset}
select no, title, contents, reg_date as regDate, member_no as memberNo, item_no as itemNo, reply_state as replyState from ${db}.item_board where no=#{no}
select no, parents_no as parentsNo, contents, reg_date as regDate from ${db}.item_reply where parents_no = #{no}
